name: Massive Arena
description:
A single-player battle royale game. Kill enemies by throwing weapons while dodging their attacks. The world shrinks every time so make sure you won't be cornered to death or leave behind the walls.

Controls:

     Arrow keys / WASD to move

     Left Click To Attack

     Right Click / Space to Dash

How to play:

Every 5 seconds the world is getting smaller and smaller. Help your tiny hero to survive against other tiny heroes to be the Tiny Champion and claim the tiny world

Every weapon has different stats (damage, knockback, and range)

Weapon Tier (Weakest to Strongest):

Ordinary Sword v1,

Ordinary Sword v2,

Hammer, 

Spear,

Mace,

Massive Hammer (Long-handled Hammer),

Knight Sword (Long Silver Sword),

Golden Sword,

Ultimate Sword (Long Golden Sword)

Character skins do not have different stats.
